pageContext.claim: “Now, the war games, I call them war games, I've been against them for a year and a half. They cost a fortune. We fly bombers all the way from Guam, massive bombers, drop bombs and then they go back to Guam. Then they come back a second time. It's crazy. We spend tens of millions, hundreds of millions of dollars on these war games. We're not being reimbursed by South Korea.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump canceled military exercises in the Korean peninsula and said they cost "hundreds of millions of dollars." But the cost is far lower. CBS calculated the cost at $3.5 million for the exercises Trump canceled. Reuters pegged the cost at $14 million, citing U.S. officials.
